pages.text: Phyto-gro is fertilizer that is densely packed with all the nutrients plants need. It can be directly applied to plants or spread in an area with $(l:thermal:equipment/explosives/phytoexplosives)some explosives$(/l).

Phyto-soil is dirt infused with phyto-gro. It increases the growth rate of plants grown on it, which can be further improved using a $(l:thermal:technology/devices/soilinfuser)phyto-soil infuser$(/l).
